open.title: Metrofibre Outage | Olympus
open.description: Please note users on the Metrofibre network in Olympus will experience limited to no connectivity due to an outage. Metrofibre engineers are attending to the fault. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.description: TT Connect has informed us of a network outage affecting parts of Edenvale, affected clients will experience no connectivity. TT Connect engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.
